MKDELTA


MKDELTA is an electronic music project from HyvinkÃƒÂ¤ÃƒÂ¤, Finland.
With the self-declared goal of making "hard/challenging yet
fascinating music", the technician behind the project meshes
8-bit sounds with athmospheric sounds, collides distorted beats
with influences from more mainstream electronic music and
contrasts random noises with the organized whole. The project&#039;s
output has been mostly influenced by music from Ant-Zen, Hymen,
Hands Productions and Ad Noiseam labels. Oldschool EBM and electro
have also been described another great influence. Thus the project
has often been described as some form of IDM, experimental
electronica or contemporary industrial.

Sites:  <a href="

RISA

RI:SA = Dark, atmospheric and experimental rock/metal-influenced
electronic music project mixing various darker genres such as Industrial,
EBM and Dark Ambient. The project was started 27.8.2006 by two young men,
both born during year 1991.

Visit: http://www.mikseri.net/risa


**************************************************
***************************

Mechanik Project

First main project as Solid from 2002 to 2007. Music style was techno and
trance. Secondary project was, and still is hiphop-beats under the name CBM.
Nowdays style has changed to dark and aggressive Drum n Bass, Big Beat and
Breakbeat. You can hear Mechanic Project in Kalisconcept Show n?GO!-trailer
and -dvd Street Elites-trailer and -dvd. Also in couple of indiemovies,
sportmovies, internet radios and compilations.

Visit:


**************************************************
***************************

Kapital Violeur

Started in october 2007 combining many musical genres such as
Electro-Industrial/Aggrotech, Industrial Metal and Symphonic Black Metal.
Our goal is to give electronic music a little metal vibe with harsh vocals
and guitar walls and symphonic vibe with strings and choirs.

visit:www.mikseri.net/kvi


**************************************************
***************************

Spiral Never Before

Spiral Never Before is an electronic music project from Lahti, Finland.
The main aim of the project has always been the experimentation with various
industrial-related genres in order to create something original and
challenging. The current style of the project could probably be described as
some form of industrial, although Spiral Never Before is constantly searching
for its own voice and form. Currently, the project is stretching its own
boundaries in search of the perfect mix of dark electronics, catchy melodies
and distorted beats.

Visit: http://www.mikseri.net/artists/?id=59587&displ_lang=en


**************************************************
***************************

Armaghast

Armaghast is soloproject of Sekunda&#039;s ex-member Simon Kiuru. Armaghast is
a rude, harsh and somehow melodic musicproject. Most songs are currently
instrumental, though there are searches for a singer for the project. The
songs tell stories of human mind, Finland, alcohol and other strange
things, and mainly focuses on EBM, aggrotech, electro-industrial, although
some noise and experimental songs are on the works. <a href="
http://www.mikseri.net/artists/?id=105961&displ_lang=en" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.mikseri.net/artists/?id=105961&displ_lang=en</a>

[The site in english]

Stomps, roars, beeps and poems committed under creutzfeldÃ‚Â´s chairmanhood
since 2004. Scene of crime located at www.mikseri.net/KRANK. Flush.



**************************************************
***************************

Antikrypt

Antikrypt is a finnish industrial/experimental music projekt. Antikypt
takes influences mainly from industrial, chiptune and noise but sometimes
also from rock or metal. Antikrypt started producing music 2007.

visit: www.mikseri.net/antikrypt


**************************************************
***************************

Disintegr8

Disintegr8 is an experimental electronic music project originally created
in 2006. The project&#039;s current musical style formed in 2007, from the
eccentric concept of combining genres like speedcore and industrial with
spacy, ambient and psychedelic soundscapes. In addition, retro elements
were incorporated in the form of C64-style drums and chiptunes. The songs
are quite progressive and often base on epic space adventures, spaceninjas
and whatnot.

Sites: http://www.last.fm/music/Disintegr8 http://www.mikseri.net/disintegr8


**************************************************
***************************

re Fusal

Project re Fusal started off in August 2007 as the result of years of
practising and finally finding that "something". re Fusal combines dark
and desperate sounds with light and beautiful melodies and aspects from
metal and electronic genres. In that way it somehow tells many thing about
my self. My goal is to pass on my feelings to the listener yet the music I
make, I make it only for me alone.

Visit: http://www.mikseri.net/refusal


**************************************************
***************************

Adfectus

Adfectus is melodic noise -project, which key features are distorted
percussions and drone-ambient atmosphere. It&#039;s a main project of 1991 born
boy Mikko from Vantaa, Finland.

Listen & DL tracks at www.mikseri.net/adfectus


**************************************************
***************************


Raep

Raep was born in July 2nd, 1991. He is a finnish amateur electonic
music artist and started making his own tracks in 2002 with a cheap
Magix software. He made distorted Techno and simple Trance. In 2005,
he realised that he should release some of his music in the Internet.
Nowadays his genres vary, but he&#039;s mainly producing (Melodic)
Freeform/Hardtrance with his Magix, creating strong amateur
characteristics. He has had thoughts about changing his software, but
there is no denyining that he is learning even more all the time.

You can D/L his tracks from: www.mikseri.net/raep.
